title: zeroth
author: zeroth
created_time: May 10, 2022, 04:07:50 PMLast edit: May 11, 2022, 02:30:42 AM by zeroth
content: The long-awaited sequel to my 2017 puzzle: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2145129Have fun!

comments.author: nullama
comments.body: Cool puzzle.But it was unsolvable in the version you posted here:The reddit version, on the left, correctly has the colors shown in hex as #aabbcc as the solver explained(#001166). The version posted here, shown on the right, has color artifacts so there's no pattern(#011066).
